Retrieve all versions of a Zenodo repository

Source: R/zenodo.R
zen_list_versions.Rd

Retrieve all versions of a Zenodo repository

zen_list_versions(record_id = zen_record_id())

Arguments

record_id

a character of length 1. The identifier of the repository in the Zenodo database.

Value

A data.frame with three columns:

  • publication_date: the date of the release of the version

  • version: the label of the version

  • access_right: is the version open or restricted?

Examples

## Versions of the FORCIS database ----

zen_list_versions()
#>   publication_date version access_right
#> 1       2023-12-14      07         open
#> 2       2023-12-12      06         open
#> 3       2023-09-14      05         open
#> 4       2023-07-26      04         open
#> 5       2023-06-14      03         open
#> 6       2023-05-24      02         open
#> 7       2022-12-02      01   restricted
